```php
public function __construct(string $filename, bool $setMime)
{
	$this->filename = $filename;
	$this->setMime  = $setMime;
}
```

<details>
<summary><small>Source: 9 lines (117 - 125)</small></summary>

```php
public function setBinary(string $binary)
{
	if ($this->file !== null)
	{
		throw DownloadException::forCannotSetBinary();
	}

	$this->binary = $binary;
}
```

</details>

<details>
<summary><small>Source: 9 lines (132 - 140)</small></summary>

```php
public function setFilePath(string $filepath)
{
	if ($this->binary !== null)
	{
		throw DownloadException::forCannotSetFilePath($filepath);
	}

	$this->file = new File($filepath, true);
}
```

</details>

#### getContentLength()

```php
public function getContentLength() : int
```

<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<table>
<tr><td>
get content length.
</td></tr>
</table>


</details>



<table style="text-align:left">

<tr>
<th style="vertical-align:top;">return</th>
<td>int
</td>
</tr>
</table>





<details>
<summary><small>Source: 13 lines (160 - 172)</small></summary>

```php
public function getContentLength() : int
{
	if (is_string($this->binary))
	{
		return strlen($this->binary);
	}
	elseif ($this->file instanceof File)
	{
		return $this->file->getSize();
	}

	return 0;
}
```

</details>


<hr>

#### setContentTypeByMimeType()

```php
private function setContentTypeByMimeType()
```

<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<table>
<tr><td>
Set content type by guessing mime type from file extension
</td></tr>
</table>


</details>



<table style="text-align:left">
</table>










<details>
<summary><small>Source: 23 lines (177 - 199)</small></summary>

```php
private function setContentTypeByMimeType()
{
	$mime    = null;
	$charset = '';

	if ($this->setMime === true)
	{
		if (($last_dot_position = strrpos($this->filename, '.')) !== false)
		{
			$mime    = Mimes::guessTypeFromExtension(substr($this->filename, $last_dot_position + 1));
			$charset = $this->charset;
		}
	}

	if (! is_string($mime))
	{
		// Set the default MIME type to send
		$mime    = 'application/octet-stream';
		$charset = '';
	}

	$this->setContentType($mime, $charset);
}
```

</details>


<hr>

#### getDownloadFileName()

```php
private function getDownloadFileName() : string
```

<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<table>
<tr><td>
get download filename.
</td></tr>
</table>


</details>



<table style="text-align:left">
</table>





<table>
<tr>
<th style="vertical-align:top;">return</th>
<td>string
</td>
</tr>
</table>





<details>
<summary><small>Source: 22 lines (206 - 227)</small></summary>

```php
private function getDownloadFileName(): string
{
	$filename  = $this->filename;
	$x         = explode('.', $this->filename);
	$extension = end($x);

	/* It was reported that browsers on Android 2.1 (and possibly older as well)
	 * need to have the filename extension upper-cased in order to be able to
	 * download it.
	 *
	 * Reference: http://digiblog.de/2011/04/19/android-and-the-download-file-headers/
	 */
	// @todo: depend super global
	if (count($x) !== 1 && isset($_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'])
			&& preg_match('/Android\s(1|2\.[01])/', $_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']))
	{
		$x[count($x) - 1] = strtoupper($extension);
		$filename         = implode('.', $x);
	}

	return $filename;
}
```

</details>


<hr>

#### getContentDisposition()

```php
private function getContentDisposition() : string
```

<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<table>
<tr><td>
get Content-Disposition Header string.
</td></tr>
</table>


</details>



<table style="text-align:left">
</table>





<table>
<tr>
<th style="vertical-align:top;">return</th>
<td>string
</td>
</tr>
</table>





<details>
<summary><small>Source: 20 lines (234 - 253)</small></summary>

```php
private function getContentDisposition() : string
{
	$download_filename = $this->getDownloadFileName();

	$utf8_filename = $download_filename;

	if (strtoupper($this->charset) !== 'UTF-8')
	{
		$utf8_filename = mb_convert_encoding($download_filename, 'UTF-8', $this->charset);
	}

	$result = sprintf('attachment; filename="%s"', $download_filename);

	if (isset($utf8_filename))
	{
		$result .= '; filename*=UTF-8\'\'' . rawurlencode($utf8_filename);
	}

	return $result;
}
```

</details>

```php
public function setDate(\DateTime $date)
{
	$date->setTimezone(new \DateTimeZone('UTC'));

	$this->setHeader('Date', $date->format('D, d M Y H:i:s') . ' GMT');

	return $this;
}
```

<td>\ResponseInterface

<details>
<summary><small>Source: 17 lines (333 - 349)</small></summary>

```php
public function setContentType(string $mime, string $charset = 'UTF-8')
{
	// add charset attribute if not already there and provided as parm
	if ((strpos($mime, 'charset=') < 1) && ! empty($charset))
	{
		$mime .= '; charset=' . $charset;
	}

	$this->removeHeader('Content-Type'); // replace existing content type
	$this->setHeader('Content-Type', $mime);
	if (! empty($charset))
	{
		$this->charset = $charset;
	}

	return $this;
}
```

</details>


<hr>

#### noCache()

```php
public function noCache() : self
```

<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<table>
<tr><td>
Sets the appropriate headers to ensure this response
is not cached by the browsers.
</td></tr>
</table>


</details>



<table style="text-align:left">
</table>










<details>
<summary><small>Source: 8 lines (355 - 362)</small></summary>

```php
public function noCache(): self
{
	$this->removeHeader('Cache-control');

	$this->setHeader('Cache-control', ['private', 'no-transform', 'no-store', 'must-revalidate']);

	return $this;
}
```

</details>


<hr>

#### setCache()

```php
public function setCache(array $options = array())
```

<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<table>
<tr><td>
A shortcut method that allows the developer to set all of the
cache-control headers in one method call.
</td></tr>
</table>

<table>
<tr><td>
The options array is used to provide the cache-control directives
for the header. It might look something like:

     $options = [
         'max-age'  => 300,
         's-maxage' => 900
         'etag'     => 'abcde',
     ];

Typical options are:
 - etag
 - last-modified
 - max-age
 - s-maxage
 - private
 - public
 - must-revalidate
 - proxy-revalidate
 - no-transform
</td></tr>
</table>

</details>

</table>

#### setLastModified()

```php
public function setLastModified($date)
```

<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<table>
<tr><td>
{@inheritDoc}
</td></tr>
</table>


</details>



<table style="text-align:left">
</table>










<details>
<summary><small>Source: 14 lines (404 - 417)</small></summary>

```php
public function setLastModified($date)
{
	if ($date instanceof \DateTime)
	{
		$date->setTimezone(new \DateTimeZone('UTC'));
		$this->setHeader('Last-Modified', $date->format('D, d M Y H:i:s') . ' GMT');
	}
	elseif (is_string($date))
	{
		$this->setHeader('Last-Modified', $date);
	}

	return $this;
}
```

</details>

#### buildHeaders()

```php
public function buildHeaders()
```

<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<table>
<tr><td>
set header for file download.
</td></tr>
</table>


</details>



<table style="text-align:left">
</table>










<details>
<summary><small>Source: 13 lines (452 - 464)</small></summary>

```php
public function buildHeaders()
{
	if (! $this->hasHeader('Content-Type'))
	{
		$this->setContentTypeByMimeType();
	}

	$this->setHeader('Content-Disposition', $this->getContentDisposition());
	$this->setHeader('Expires-Disposition', '0');
	$this->setHeader('Content-Transfer-Encoding', 'binary');
	$this->setHeader('Content-Length', (string)$this->getContentLength());
	$this->noCache();
}
```

</details>


<hr>

#### sendHeaders()

```php
public function sendHeaders()
```

<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<table>
<tr><td>
Sends the headers of this HTTP request to the browser.
</td></tr>
</table>


</details>



<table style="text-align:left">
</table>





<table>
<tr>
<th style="vertical-align:top;">return</th>
<td>\DownloadResponse
</td>
</tr>
</table>





<details>
<summary><small>Source: 27 lines (471 - 497)</small></summary>

```php
public function sendHeaders()
{
	// Have the headers already been sent?
	if ($this->pretend || headers_sent())
	{
		return $this;
	}

	// Per spec, MUST be sent with each request, if possible.
	// http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec13.html
	if (! isset($this->headers['Date']))
	{
		$this->setDate(\DateTime::createFromFormat('U', time()));
	}

	// HTTP Status
	header(sprintf('HTTP/%s %s %s', $this->getProtocolVersion(), $this->getStatusCode(), $this->getReason()), true,
			$this->getStatusCode());

	// Send all of our headers
	foreach ($this->getHeaders() as $name => $values)
	{
		header($name . ': ' . $this->getHeaderLine($name), false, $this->getStatusCode());
	}

	return $this;
}
```

</details>

#### sendBody()

```php
public function sendBody()
```

<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

output download file text.

<td>\DownloadException
</td>

</table>



<details>
<summary><small>Source: 13 lines (506 - 518)</small></summary>

```php
public function sendBody()
{
	if ($this->binary !== null)
	{
		return $this->sendBodyByBinary();
	}
	elseif ($this->file !== null)
	{
		return $this->sendBodyByFilePath();
	}

	throw DownloadException::forNotFoundDownloadSource();
}
```

</details>


<hr>

#### sendBodyByFilePath()

```php
private function sendBodyByFilePath()
```

<details>
<summary style="margin-bottom:12px;"><strong>Description</strong></summary>

<table>
<tr><td>
output download text by file.
</td></tr>
</table>


</details>



<table style="text-align:left">
</table>





<table>
<tr>
<th style="vertical-align:top;">return</th>
<td>\DownloadResponse
</td>
</tr>
</table>





<details>
<summary><small>Source: 12 lines (525 - 536)</small></summary>

```php
private function sendBodyByFilePath()
{
	$spl_file_object = $this->file->openFile('rb');

	// Flush 1MB chunks of data
	while (! $spl_file_object->eof() && ($data = $spl_file_object->fread(1048576)) !== false)
	{
		echo $data;
	}

	return $this;
}
```

</details>
